item.title: Anti-sexual frigidity: glamour and desire under maximalism
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Original Dobby Aesthetics A few years ago, minimalism was on the rise, and I followed this trend and started to break away. But by now, I’ve thrown away quite a few things, moved more and more things at a time, bought more and more, and have an unabated desire to shop. Now it seems that minimalist living is not for everyone, and we should be cautious about following this trend.
